channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Riojan pork, chorizo and potato pot
item.description:
Riojan pork, chorizo and potato pot



This typically Spanish one pot is packed with flavour and can be made-ahead - perfect for relaxed entertaining or a family midweek meal served with crusty bread..

item.title: Pasta e fagioli
item.description:
Pasta e fagioli



Translating as ‘pasta and beans’ and inspired by the classic Italian soup, this is cold-weather comfort food at its best..

item.title: Cheesy taco pasta
item.description:
Cheesy taco pasta



Italian meets Mexican in this tasty Cheesy Taco Pasta dish. Pasta is a great cost-effective way to bulk out meals for the family. Choose wholemeal or high fibre versions as often as possible..

item.title: Beef tagine with sweet potatoes, peas, ginger and ras el hanout
item.description:
Beef tagine with sweet potatoes, peas, ginger and ras el hanout



This fairly fiery dish is laced with the powerful flavours and aromas of ras el hanout, a traditional spice mix..

item.title: Jerked angry birds
item.description:
Jerked angry birds



A good jerk chicken is underpinned by the seasonings that come from the jerk trinity of allspice, Scotch bonnet and thyme..
